about_the_game:
Introducing Trolls vs Vikings: Reborn – The Game Where Strategy Meets Mischief!

Get ready to don your tactical horns (and maybe a trollish grin) for the ultimate strategy showdown. Building on the beloved original that enthralled over 1.3 million players and got massive nods from players, Apple, Microsoft, Amazon and Google, this premium edition cranks the epic dial to 11 with tons of new features and upgrades:

  • Brutal Difficulty Level: Think you’re tough? Face 34 unforgiving levels that will make even the most seasoned strategists question their life choices. Are you brave enough to cry a little? Or a lot? Then this is for you!

  • Expanded Special Missions: Dive into 35 mind-bending missions with encounters that include Nordic gods and scenarios so complex, you’ll wonder if you’re battling gods or writing a doctoral thesis in Viking trickery.

  • Overhauled Upgrade System: No more pay-to-win nonsense here! Loki tricked us into making the first game free-to-play (of course he did—he’s Loki). But we’ve learned from our mischief-laden past and revamped the shard system to deliver pure, sweat-and-tears gameplay progression. Fair and balanced, like a troll on a tightrope.

  • Revamped Spell Mechanics: Now you can sling spells with a sense of strategic satisfaction and a smirk that says, “Take that, Thor.”

  • Enhanced Visuals: Witness trolls in their high-definition glory as they charge headfirst into the fray, with all the detail and clarity of a blockbuster movie (minus the popcorn).

  • Remastered Soundtrack: Groove to the epic new “Trolls Forever” theme by Aleksandar Dimitrijević, featuring real troll and gnome musicians. (Yes, we’ve gone full method.)

  • Revitalized Viking Art and Animations: Our award-winning animator has infused the Vikings with so much personality, you’ll almost feel bad stomping them. Almost.

  • Steam Achievements: Bragging rights? Absolutely. Earn achievements that show your strategic genius—or your sheer stubbornness.

  • Pure Gameplay Experience: No more free-to-play elements here. We’ve booted Loki’s trickster schemes, so you can enjoy uninterrupted, pure strategy bliss. Or, wait, he is still in the game! Wonder what he is up to this time around?

And yes, the legendary endless Valhalla levels are back, ready to put even the toughest tacticians to the test. Brace yourself for challenges so maddening that they’ll leave you gripping your mouse, eyes wide, shouting, “Who needs sleep, anyway?!” and muttering, “Just… one… more… round…” as dawn breaks through your window.

Are you ready to dive into Trolls vs Vikings: Reborn where strategy is king, trolls reign supreme, and your sanity is the final boss?
